Alfter is a municipality in the Rhein-Si: The community of Alfter lies west of former capital of Bonn
in North Rhine-Westphalia: on the southern ridge of the "Vorgebirge". It borders on the city of Bornheim to the north
column4: the cities of Meckenheim and Rheinbach to the south and the community of Swisttal to the west. Alfter consists of a total area of 35 km²
column5: of which 18 km² is used for agricultural purposes and 8 km² is forest.
